mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AC_BOARD(B_ID, B_CODE, M_ID, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, N_VIEW, N_CREATE_DATE, B_ALT) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{b_code}, #{m_id}, #{n_title}, #{n_content}, 0, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{b_alt})
mapper.select: SELECT B.B_ID, BC.B_CODE, M.M_ID, M.M_NAME, B.N_TITLE, B.N_CREATE_DATE, B.B_ALT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AC_HEART H WHERE H.B_ID = B.B_ID) AS h_cnt, B.N_VIEW FROM AC_BOARD B INNER JOIN AC_MEMBER M ON M.M_ID = B.M_ID INNER JOIN AC_BOARD_CODE BC ON B.B_CODE = BC.B_CODE INNER JOIN ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM AC_BOARD ORDER BY B_ID desc ) A ) SUB ON B.B_ID = SUB.B_ID WHERE SUB.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} AND BC.B_CODE = #{b_code}

SELECT B.B_ID, BC.B_CODE, M.M_ID, M.M_NAME, B.N_TITLE, B.N_CONTENT, B.N_CREATE_DATE, B.N_VIEW, B.B_ALT FROM AC_BOARD B, AC_MEMBER M, AC_BOARD_CODE BC WHERE M.M_ID = B.M_ID AND B.B_CODE = BC.B_CODE AND BC.B_CODE = #{b_code} AND B.B_ID = ${b_id} GROUP BY B.B_ID,BC.B_CODE, M.M_ID, M.M_NAME, B.N_TITLE, B.N_CONTENT, B.N_CREATE_DATE, B.N_VIEW, B.B_ALT
mapper.update: UPDATE AC_BOARD SET N_TITLE = #{n_title}, N_CONTENT = #{n_content}, B_ALT = #{b_alt}, N_UPDATE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHERE B_ID = #{b_id}
UPDATE AC_BOARD SET N_VIEW = N_VIEW + 1 WHERE B_ID = #{b_id}
mapper.select: SELECT B.B_ID, M.M_ID, B.B_ALT FROM AC_BOARD B, AC_MEMBER M WHERE M.M_ID = B.M_ID AND B.B_ID = #{b_id} GROUP BY B.B_ID, M.M_ID, B.B_ALT
